intro: Thoa tenuifolia, commonly known as the slender leaf thoa, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its narrow, elongated leaves and small, white to pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forests or along stream banks. Thoa tenuifolia is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
